p: Forty six (46) EO constituents were identified in the J. sabina samples collected in Bulgaria and Slovakia ( Supplementary Table S2). Overall, the major EO constituents of J. sabina were sabinene (16.68–30.98%), terpinen-4-ol (9.25–13.63%), myrtenyl acetate (1.32–23.02%), elemol (8.45–13.70%) and α-cadinol (3.47–3.77%). Other EO constituents which were above 1% of the total oil included α-thujene, α-pinene, p-cymene, limonene and δ-cadinene. The EO profile of J. sabina from Slovakia was not very different; it was generally within the observed profile of the J. sabina EO accessions from Bulgaria ( Supplementary Table S2).
